alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 8:44AM PST until December 25 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze to five tenths of an inch. * WHERE...In Oregon, Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon. In Washington, Kittitas Valley and Yakima Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Difficult to hazardous travel conditions are possible with very slippery conditions, including Interstates 84 and 82, and Route 97.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.
